item.title: Money vs live experience
item.description: Car Insurance We were walking along a coastal cliff path and he was talking about car insurance. Past the mauve poppy. “I found a good deal for my car insurance.” Past the blue argus butterfly. “So, I transferred from my old provider.” Past the sweet pea. “I’ve saved £250.” Past the flattened grass where the rabbits run. “And the no-claims bonus is better.” Past hundreds of dandelions. “I’ve got a nose for a good offer.
